item.title: Wednesday 12-Feb-2026
item.description: Partly cloudy. Temperature: 15-22°C. Humidity: 65%. Wind: NW 5 m/s. No precipitation expected.

item.title: Thursday 13-Feb-2026
item.description: Sunny and clear. Temperature: 16-24°C. Humidity: 60%. Wind: W 4 m/s. No precipitation expected.

item.title: Friday 14-Feb-2026
item.description: Mostly sunny. Temperature: 17-25°C. Humidity: 58%. Wind: SW 3 m/s. No precipitation expected.

item.title: Saturday 15-Feb-2026
item.description: Partly cloudy with chance of rain. Temperature: 14-20°C. Humidity: 75%. Wind: W 6 m/s. Precipitation: 2-5 mm expected.

item.title: Sunday 16-Feb-2026
item.description: Cloudy with occasional rain. Temperature: 13-18°C. Humidity: 80%. Wind: NW 7 m/s. Precipitation: 5-10 mm expected.
